name: Gravity Break
description:
Current highscore:

36992

by Kristian Bak

January 5th 2020 (v.0.1.2) Instructions

  

  •  Arrow keys / WASD to move.
  •  Touch yellow salvage to earn points.
  •  Mouse wheel to zoom.
  •  Change timescale with top slider.
  •  Refuel at planets.
  •  Post your highest score in the comments.

Diamond in the rough?

Being a solo developer, I am in constant lack of feedback on my work, but I believe this game is something special. The project has existed in the current form since summer 2018, but the spirit of it has been around since 2010. I need to figure out, if I am wasting my time, or if I have found something pretty cool in this simulation.

My long term aim right now is to create a space adventure, with dynamic resource management, ship customization and an epic story spanning nothing more (or less) than our entire solar system.

Check my dev log for tips!

Follow and comment, I will be putting out regular updates!
